Text:
Thanks for this torrent.
I got to know this game on a Win PC, and since then I've played several versions of it. I love to play it in my spare time.
Np appreciate the thanks. have a good time playing.

Download was easy but I have trouble with controls during the game. Mousepad lags and doesn't allow me to shoot sometimes--very annoying as the game becomes more involved. At this point, I find it almost unplayable. Any fixes for that or is this a bad  crack? I am running 10.6.7.
